messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Hello, there!
Aren’t you going to swim?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
What’s saltier?
My tears or the sea...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
There aren’t many sea routes that
you can swim in Sinnoh.It makes me want to take a vacation
in the Hoenn region.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
When I see people surfing, I don’t
feel jealous or anything.I just simply love to swim!
